hi and welcome you're listening to the
x22 rapport my name is Dave and this is
episode 1685 a and today's date is
October 9th 2018 and the thought of the
episode is confirmed contradict the Fed
economy collapse blame the Fed let's get
into the economic collapse financial
news now we've been getting warnings all
over the place and we need to think back
and think about why they are warning
everyone I mean when Obama was president
we're going through this recovery no
warnings the economy was doing great it
was recovering and those numbers those
statistical numbers that they manipulate
they weren't that great Trump comes into
the presidency manipulates the numbers
even more using their methods makes the
economy look incredible now we have
warnings all over the place the housing
markets coming down the global debt is
too high the interest rates are being
raised and Trump came out and
contradicted the Fed and he did this
twice saying that he thought that Powell
was an easy money Fed not an interest
rate fed and then the second time said
listen raising the interest rate right
now is not going to help because we have
to pay off the debt this is not going to
help the situation and we know that
Trump is going to contradict the Fed
again because they just raised their
rates and right on cue this is exactly
what he did now let's think about this
what is the plan here the entire plan
was to delay the collapse of the system
now why would he have to delay the
collapse well he became president and he
needed to reverse everything needed to
get rid of TPP needed to get rid of
NAFTA or renegotiate NAFTA because it
was very difficult to get rid of because
he had to go through the Congress
dismantle the globalist system and start
to reorganize everything now how do you
delay all of this well you give tax cuts
this will delay the inevitable because
it gives disposable income back to the
people it allows corporations to
continue on and it gives you this buffer
area but that buffer area will only last
a certain period of time and then the
economy will continue in its downward
slide remember we've been following the
economy for a very long time and we know
what's going to happen we've seen it
time and time again the Fed raises the
rates and the system implodes that it
get the debt gets too high you go
bankrupt I mean it's a very simple thing
to understand here so right now we are
in the delay phase of the economy why
because the plan is to get rid of the
globalist system bring back
manufacturing bring back everything that
was taken away can we bring back
everything most likely not but we can do
it to a point where at least the US will
be prepared for this transition and
that's where we are right now and we can
see that global liquidity it's rapidly
shrinking right now because each central
bank they are tightening and they're
gonna start raising rates a little bit
because the central banks believed and
they thought that there was going to be
someone else in the White House and they
thought they were going to use an event
to cover up their entire crash of the
global system well that didn't work out
if you notice the IMF the biz they're
all out there blaming Trump's policy the
trade war between the US and China and
they continually do this but when you
look at the situation and this is why
we've been following the economy for
such a long time we know that the
economy was breaking down for a
completely different reason and the
purpose of the trade war was not to
bring down the economy because of the
trade war it was to set up a system
where manufacturing can be brought back
to the United States and tariffs the
cost of exporting and importing can be
leveled out where you have an even
playing field
amongst the countries because remember
the globalist system did not help the
u.s. that wasn't their plan their plan
was to make the u.s. a third world
nation that's not happening right now
now we know that China they are in on
this
Russia is in on this and as Trump
continually makes these bilateral trade
agreements puts tariffs on China try to
bring as much manufacturing back to the
states reduces regulations he's gonna be
doing all of this to bring the companies
back to the US this is why he's trying
to make all these deals China they're
eventually going to help crash the
system think about what China has a huge
amount of Treasuries and China has
already been saying that listen if this
continues we're just gonna sell off all
our Treasuries what happens if they sell
off all their Treasuries yes the Fed can
purchase them yes
maybe's pension funds can purchase them
but it's going to be completely
disastrous if this happens but this is
not going to happen as of yet because we
know that China has been propping up
their system buying a lot of gold and
creating the petrol you want and their
currency that Chinese yuan is tracking
gold even closer now than any other
currency market and there's a reason for
this and we know that China when the
time comes they will dump Treasuries not
by the millions not by the billions most
likely a trillion now think about what
the IMF is doing right now the IMF is
warning that risks are all out there
that we're going to see a second Great
Depression and they're saying these
risks are because of China and the
United States and the Fed as they raise
rates they're hurting the emerging
markets they're going to be hurting the
global economy and this is not going to
work out
and they're saying that major economies
right now they have peaked and we must
steer away and must resist
self-sufficiency this is the IMF's
message now right on cue
Trump double down on his criticism of
the Fed now he was traveling to Iowa for
a rally and said the Federal Reserve is
moving too fast
with interest rate increases hmm he went
on to say I don't like what the Fed is
doing this is what he told White House
reporters I think we don't have to go as
fast on rate hikes I like low interest
rates he said already as soon as the Fed
raised interest rates he's already
criticizing the Fed once again
now Michael Krieger tweeted out the
following this is exactly why Trump can
still win in 2020 even if the economy
tanks he will blame the Fed and his base
will eat it up actually this is the plan
this is the entire plan he's out there
criticizing the Fed building the idea
that the Fed is responsible for the
economy collapsing Powell is working
with them what is Powell saying Powell
is saying listen I'm gonna keep raising
interest rates and I don't care about
market volatility I don't care if the

stop because the Fed and Trump and the
rest of the Patriots they know what
happens when you raise rates go back in
time they did it every single time and
added the 13 times I believe 12 ended up
in a recession this time isn't any
different this time they're pushing it
to a certain interest rate and I believe
this is going to be around two point
eight three percent once it reaches that
point everything starts to
all apart and Trump how to do something
to delay all of this before he got
Powell in there because the system was
not doing well whatsoever everything was
in a bubble it was going to crash if
nothing was done the system would have
come down this is why we got an
injection of like sugar or a drug and
all of a sudden the economy took off
this is why Trump and the Patriots had
to recalculate the GDP and add a

the economy to look like it is doing
better than anyone could have imagined
this way the mainstream media all the
other financial pundits the other Fed

couldn't say Trump wrote it down because
Trump knew that he was going to have to
implement tariffs Trump knew and I'm
just not saying strumpets the group of

he was going to have to dismantle the

look incredible even though in the

were manipulated in the background the
economy is completely dead it's
completely dead I mean think about it we

we hit a certain point and they feel

and blame can be made to the fed showing
that they're the ones who are
responsible for this
that's when it's all going to happen and
this is why the IMF the biz the
mainstream media they're all talking
about a recession a depression because
they already knew the economy was
week they already knew that this was
going to happen no matter what they
already knew that this is where we are
headed now they're going to try to

is already out there saying well it's
because of the trade wars it's because
of his fiscal policies this is why
everything's starting to break down and
the economy's out there have reached a

except down the mainstream media is now

about how retail is not doing that well
even though they're same statistical

but they're trying to build this

they're building the narrative to go

that's why he has Andrew Jackson once

there this has been planned out and it's

where does the funding come well from a

elites the biz
the IMF not the people of the u.s. so

because we're doing away with the

and right on cue
Trump came out and started to criticize

get prepared listen everyone thanks a
